title: Interdisciplinary Math-Science Integrated Lesson Design Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theory and understanding of secondary-level curricula
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of smartphone-based digital content utilization and offline collaborative activities. Providing continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Design and present one or more activity plans integrating scientific principles into mathematics instruction
Propose at least three strategies considering learners' cognitive and linguistic needs in interdisciplinary lesson design
Perform peer feedback at least twice using smartphone-based assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
